description:
I can`t focus...probably because I skipped breakfast...
Stupid Futaba, she says grabbing my stomach`s like grabbing an I-cup!
Hmm...?  Th-The "Vibe-Shape Belt," it makes you skinny just by wearing it!
What a wonderful device....It`s so expensive, but I want it so bad!
Huh?  Hey, it`s Sugisaki`s cell phone...
H-Holy cow!  If I put this on my stomach...
Aah...my abs...my abs...they`re getting tighter...What an amazing discovery!
Mitsu: I`ll use dad`s phone when I get home.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maji de Hen Suru Go Byou Mae
